snippet: CEDARBAUM--Miriam Goldman. Died peacefully on February 5, at the age of 86. Judge Cedarbaum is survived by her two sons and daughters-in-law, Daniel Goldman Cedarbaum (Caryn Jacobs) and Jonathan Goldman Cedarbaum (Alice Winkler), her four grandchildren, Jacob Cedarbaum, Samuel Goldman Cedarbaum, Louis Cedarbaum and Dahlia Cedarbaum, and by her beloved companion Bob Ehrenbard. Judge Cedarbaum's beloved husband of almost 49 years, Bernard Cedarbaum, passed away ten years ago. The funeral service will be held Tuesday, February 9, at 11:30am, at Park Avenue Synagogue, 50 East 87th Street (at the corner of Madison Avenue). For further information, e-mail Daniel Cedarbaum at dgcedarbaum@gmail.com. Contributions in her memory may be made to to The Mordecai M. Kaplan Center for Jewish Peoplehood: kaplancenter.org or Barnard College: barnard.edu/barnard-giving. 1/3
